channel.title: What really happened on 9/11. [IMAGE HEAVY]
channel.description:
On September 11th 2001, At 8:46 a.m., five hijackers crashed American Airlines Flight 11 into the World Trade Center's North Tower. Below is compelling evidence of pictures taken just as the plane first hit the tower. Never before seen photos and frames from a video camera......
This was taken just as the terrorist flew the plane into the first tower. Who knows how the camera survived, it was found only recently. This was taken from a video, the sound heard is very quite, mostly deafening explosions but:
"AAAAAAHHHHHHHH LLLLLLAAAAAAAA " The tape then ends. [img]http://i.imgur.com/g5oGHl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yJE9Il.png[/img]
Multiple photos have been found from passengers cameras. Poor souls didn't know what was coming. This was taken by seat 4 row 3. [img]http://i.imgur.com/YkZEAl.png[/img]
We don't know how this photo was taken, but it seems to be from outside the plane on the wing. Perhaps the Presumebly trying to capture what was happening. [img]http://i.imgur.com/NGTKul.png[/img]
This image was captured from the ground, JUST as the plane collided with the building. [img]http://i.imgur.com/MGc9ml.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CvPjul.png[/img]
This picture was taken from another building. [img]http://i.imgur.com/4O1xZl.png[/img]
This is a very interesting image as we can see the plane has been broken from approximatly where a previous photo was taken. There is a person standing on the wing. This photo was taken my a helicopter. [img]http://i.imgur.com/DOfB5l.png[/img]
The poor people who were above the impact zone had no chance of survival. This is the only photo from above the impact zone found. The rest of the film was burnt. [img]http://i.imgur.com/T160pl.png[/img]
This is a tragic image of someone who was in the impact zone. Their body was never found. [img]http://i.imgur.com/phb9bl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oYXr8l.png[/img]
This image was taken just as the plane hit, you can see the building starting to errupt in flames. [img]http://i.imgur.com/roy86l.png[/img]
[size=1pt]Its a joke! Yes its very tragic, but we can get some laughs out of it right? inb4 ban. :/[/size]

item.title: What really happened on 9/11. [IMAGE HEAVY]
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

super_:

I had to re-read your sentences several times, and still I could barely make out what you were saying. Is your English exceptionally poor, or am I just exceptionally tired?

Lets call it both!

Pwnd:

I will kill OP

Come at me bro!

[quote=“John459, post:16, topic:418419”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=520962.msg3785194#msg3785194 date=1318800675]
RIP the poor souls that died.

This explains the existence of zombies in minecraft
[/quote]

Are you saying the event that occurred on 9/11 was actually an experiment ran by the government to try and create zombies?[/quote]
Yes, just for Notch. You see Notch contacted the FBI in 2001 expressing his interest in creating minecraft to use it as more ‘cotton wool’ to pull over the eyes of the people of the USA. Its taken the FBI and Notch to come to an agreement over how it should work, its result is minecraft.

item.title: What really happened on 9/11. [IMAGE HEAVY]
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

On September 11th 2001, At 8:46 a.m., five hijackers crashed American Airlines Flight 11 into the World Trade Center’s North Tower. Below is compelling evidence of pictures taken just as the plane first hit the tower. Never before seen photos and frames from a video camera…

This was taken just as the terrorist flew the plane into the first tower. Who knows how the camera survived, it was found only recently. This was taken from a video, the sound heard is very quite, mostly deafening explosions but:

"AAAAAAHHHHHHHH LLLLLLAAAAAAAA " The tape then ends.

Multiple photos have been found from passengers cameras. Poor souls didn’t know what was coming. This was taken by seat 4 row 3.

We don’t know how this photo was taken, but it seems to be from outside the plane on the wing. Perhaps the Presumebly trying to capture what was happening.

This image was captured from the ground, JUST as the plane collided with the building.

This picture was taken from another building.

This is a very interesting image as we can see the plane has been broken from approximatly where a previous photo was taken. There is a person standing on the wing. This photo was taken my a helicopter.

The poor people who were above the impact zone had no chance of survival. This is the only photo from above the impact zone found. The rest of the film was burnt.

This is a tragic image of someone who was in the impact zone. Their body was never found.

This image was taken just as the plane hit, you can see the building starting to errupt in flames.

[size=1pt]Its a joke! Yes its very tragic, but we can get some laughs out of it right? inb4 ban. :/[/size]
